desc: Our Sontro™ Hearing Aids use the self-fitting otoTune™ app to allow you to customize your hearing with a 3-minute hearing test on your mobile phone.

layout.text:
Soundwave Hearing is a health technology company committed to the idea that good hearing health improves lives. We believe that everyone should have access to high-quality hearing aid technology.

People who search for online hearing aids have come to the right place! By taking advantage of the power of mobile phones and state-of-the-art hearing aid technology using the otoTune™ app, Soundwave has created hearing aids poised for the newly created Over The Counter Hearing Aid marketplace.
